hero.title: Indulge in extraordinary care
hero.subtitle: Experience the pinnacle of beauty and relaxation at our award-winning spa. From signature treatments to bespoke styling, every service is designed to transport you to a world of serenity and transformation.
hero.imageAlt: Luxurious spa interior with elegant treatment rooms

about.title: A Sanctuary of Beauty
about.subtitle: Where luxury meets wellness
about.content: Since 2010, Serenity Spa & Salon has been the premier destination for discerning clients seeking the finest in beauty and wellness. Our 5,000 sq ft retreat features private treatment suites, organic product lines, and master aestheticians trained in the latest European techniques.

products.name: Signature Facial Experience
products.description: 90-minute bespoke facial with LED therapy, lymphatic drainage, and customized mask. Includes scalp and d√©collet√© massage.

products.name: Master Stylist Cut & Finish
products.description: Precision cutting with our award-winning master stylists. Includes scalp treatment, blow dry, and style.

products.name: Balayage Color Artistry
products.description: Hand-painted highlights by color specialists. Includes Olaplex treatment, toner, and signature blow out.

products.name: Aromatherapy Body Treatment
products.description: Full body exfoliation, wrap, and massage with essential oils. Pure bliss.

products.name: Luxury Manicure & Pedicure
products.description: Indulgent nail service with paraffin treatment, massage, and gel polish. Pure perfection.

products.name: Bridal Luxury Package
products.description: Complete wedding day experience with trial, hair, makeup, lash extensions, and spa treatment.

items.text: Serenity is my sanctuary. The attention to detail and level of service is unmatched. Every visit feels like a mini vacation.
items.author: Victoria Sterling
items.title: Executive Client

items.text: The bridal package was extraordinary. My entire party was pampered beyond belief. Worth every penny for the most important day of my life.
items.author: Sophia Laurent
items.title: Bride

items.text: I've visited spas around the world, and Serenity ranks among the absolute finest. The aestheticians are true artists.
items.author: Catherine Moore
items.title: VIP Member

members.name: Isabella Rousseau
members.title: Spa Director & Master Aesthetician
members.bio: 20+ years experience training under masters in Paris and Switzerland. Specializes in advanced skincare and anti-aging treatments.
